headline: Verizon Frontline delivers critical connectivity during U.S. Capitol Christmas Tree Harvest
summary: What you need to know: The Verizon Frontline Crisis Response Team supported the U.S. Forest Service with multiple mission-critical communications solutions during the harvest of the U.S. Capitol Christmas Tree near Wrangell, AlaskaAdvanced communication technologies will assist the crew transporting the tree across the continent from Alaska to Washington, D.C.
